description: Can't authenticate via Azure Cli, throws error say azure cli not installed. VScode terrafrom plugin doesn't load. Installed directly from Terraform site, works fine.

Terraform doesn't quite work if installed this way as it cannot make use of your path, in my case it couldn't use git and therefore was not able to download modules.
I recommend just installing Terraform the old fashion way.
summary: Doesn't work when installed this way

description: terraform itself is great. This package is over a year behind....
Not sure who is maintaining this snap but looks like they forgot about it.
summary: This snap is out of date. Latest version is 0.12.24
